alert.note: Alert for Adams (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 3:02PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN ADAMS COUNTY THROUGH 345 PM EDT... At 301 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gettysburg, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and very heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Very heavy rainfall is also occurring which may lead to localized flooding. Locations impacted include... Hampton, Lake Meade, New Oxford, Aspers, Biglerville, Abbottstown, Arendtsville, York Springs, Heidlersburg, Bendersville, Hunterstown, Idaville and Gardners. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
